spec_data.Name: perl-Term-ProgressBar
spec_data.Description:
Term::ProgressBar provides a simple progress bar on the terminal, to let
the user know that something is happening, roughly how much stuff has been
done, and maybe an estimate at how long remains.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 02 Aug 2017 10:55:13 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provide a progress meter on a standard terminal
